title: 🏡Live Your Best Life At Met245- 🤽‍♂️Ruston Living Apply Now👀🌊
map_address: 245 Saint Helens Avenue near 4th & Saint Helens
posting_body: ['Met245 Apartments', '245 Saint Helens Avenue, Tacoma, WA, 98402', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 123', 'OR Text', '123', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our team.', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'THE LIFESTYLE YOU CRAVE, THE LOCATION YOU WANT, THE CONVENIENCE YOU NEED.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 625 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Met245 represents the ultimate expression of vibrant Tacoma living.', 'This stylish and pet-friendly apartment community offers a world of simple sophistication, framed with endlessly fascinating views of Puget Sound and Mount Rainier.', 'Unlock your stunning studio, one- or two-bedroom apartment home to reveal an open-concept living space that features a gourmet kitchen with European cabinetry and modern appliance package, breakfast bar, full-size washer and dryer, large closets, and awe-inspiring views.', 'Met245 boasts exclusive community amenities like an indoor and outdoor pool, indoor spa, two club-quality fitness centers, a 39-seat movie theater with surround sound, indoor putting green, dance studio, and so much more.', 'Nestled at the crossroads of the Stadium District and Downtown Tacoma, residents are afforded access to the area’s abundant cultural, recreational, and entertainment activities.', 'Met245’s proximity to top employers, major interstates, and mass transit further cements this apartment community as a phenomenal place to call home.', 'At Met245, we work hard so you can live well.', 'Pet Policy', 'Dogs Allowed: Breed Restrictions', '$250 Deposit', '$250 Pet Fee', '$35/Monthly Pet Rent', '2 Pet Limit', 'Cats Allowed', '$500 Fee', '2 Pet Limit', 'Fish Allowed', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5 times the monthly rent.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday: 9:30AM-5:00PM', 'Saturday: 10:30AM-4:00PM', 'Z1vkO13j']
